title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: When using JDK 1.4, the All Types dialog displays obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc. These obfuscated classes should be less prominent in the dialog.
OB: The All Types dialog displays obfuscated classes like 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
EB: The All Types dialog should display obfuscated classes in a less prominent manner.
SR:
1. Install JDK 1.4
2. Open the All Types dialog
3. Observe the presence of obfuscated classes in the dialog
